Player History
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 8/10/1985 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1987, off Steve Howe (OAK)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/5/1987, off Tommy Boggs (TEX)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/15/1987, hitting .519 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/17/1988, hitting .484 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1988, hitting .343 with 5 HR, 22 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1988, hitting .359 with 7 HR, 28 RBI...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/15/1988 with a Concussion, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (Y) on 9/10/1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/11/1988, hitting .520 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...
Drove in 7 runs against Detroit on 9/22/1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/25/1988, hitting .407 with 2 HR, 13 RBI...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,664,286 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 6/11/1989 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (Y) on 7/12/1989...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/17/1989, hitting .517 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Kansas City on 8/27/1989...
2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,828,571 through salary arbitration...
5/18/1990: Signed a contract extension with Seattle, $4,000,000 per year, for 4 years.
Won Player of the Week award on 6/5/1991, hitting .484 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
